channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Facing anti-DEI investigations, colleges cut ties with nonprofit targeted by conservatives
item.description: The U.S. Education Department says it has investigated dozens of universities for alleged racial discrimination, citing ties to a nonprofit organization that has helped Black and Latino students pursue business degrees.

item.title: Detentions of European tourists at US borders spark fears of traveling to America
Some voters are pushing back on lawmakersâ€™ efforts to overturn citizen ballot initiatives
